Metadata.title: Salifu & Master
Metadata.description: Pick up passengers. Make your sales. Survive the streets. A trotro driving game set in West Africa.

Hero.title: Salifu & Master
Hero.tagline: Pick up passengers. Make your sales. Survive the streets.

GameConcept.pitch: You're a trotro mate — a bus conductor hustling through the city. Pick up passengers, dodge traffic, manage your health, and make your sales before the day ends.

drive.title: Drive
drive.description: Navigate the city's busiest routes in your trotro

hustle.title: Hustle
hustle.description: Pick up passengers, collect fares, meet your daily target

survive.title: Survive
survive.description: Manage hunger, health & sanity while Master watches

salifu.name: Salifu
salifu.description: You. A trotro mate hustling the streets to make your daily sales.

masterKofi.name: Master Kofi
masterKofi.description: Your boss. He takes his cut — and he's watching your every move.

serwaa.name: Serwaa
serwaa.description: Your peace of mind. Visit her to restore your sanity — but it'll cost you.

amelia.name: Amelia
amelia.description: "Charley! You dey hungry?" Waakye and Jollof to keep you going.

madinaKaneshie.name: Madina → Kaneshie
madinaKaneshie.description: The classic route through Accra's heart. Perfect for learning the trade.

madinaTema.name: Madina → Tema
madinaTema.description: The eastern corridor to Ghana's port city. Through Adenta and Spintex Road.

lapazAchimota.name: Lapaz → Achimota
lapazAchimota.description: Busy commercial stretch. More passengers, tighter windows.

temaAshaiman.name: Tema → Ashaiman
temaAshaiman.description: Industrial corridor. High fares, but unforgiving. Only veterans survive.

kasoaMallam.name: Kasoa → Mallam
kasoaMallam.description: The legendary gauntlet. Traffic chaos, desperate passengers, glory awaits.

threeMinuteRounds.title: 3-Minute Rounds
threeMinuteRounds.description: Quick, intense gameplay loops you can play anywhere.

authenticCulture.title: Authentic Culture
authenticCulture.description: Real streets, real food, real language.

meetCharacters.title: Meet the Characters
meetCharacters.description: Your girlfriend, your boss, the vendors — all with personality.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: 20+ achievements to hunt across every route.

1.title: Pick a Route
1.description: Choose from 5 routes across the city, each with unique challenges.

2.title: Pick Up Passengers
2.description: Tap to pick up and drop off passengers at each stop. Collect your fares.

3.title: Make Your Sales
3.description: Meet your daily target before time runs out. Earn stars and level up.

CtaBanner.heading: Your trotro is waiting.
CtaBanner.subtext: Free. No download. Play in your browser.
